title: English at Work. - Eps. 22-24.
creator_credit: SBS-TV, Diane Sundin, Mark Sanders, Ray Quint and Mandy Smith
brief_description: Episode 22, “Finding a place to live” examines the way that government agencies can assist people in selecting public or private accommodation. In “Voting” the Australian electoral system is explained and the importance of informed voting is debated. In “Making a new start” we are given a run-down on the new programs being introduced for unemployed people, particularly New Start and the Job Search Allowance.
